QuestData.Title: How to Break Into the Arcatraz
QuestData.Description: A message was embedded in the ata'mal crystal that you recovered. Nexus-Prince Haramad has given us information vital to our campaign against Tempest Keep.$B$BHe tells us that there are two pieces, shards to a key, which, when combined, will unlock the keep's Arcatraz satellite.$B$BOne half is possessed by an ancient in the Botanica known as Warp Splinter. The other is held by Pathaleon the Calculator inside the Mechanar.$B$BBring both shards to me and I will combine them into the Arcatraz key.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has tasked you with the recovery of the Top and Bottom Shards of the Arcatraz Key. Return them to him, and he will fashion them into the Key to the Arcatraz for you.
QuestData.CompletionText: <A'dal's voice vibrates melodically through your mind.>$B$BYou have returned. Do you bring with you the two shards of the Arcatraz key?
QuestData.RewardText: I am impressed, $n, though I should expect nothing less of the $g hero : heroine; who returned the ata'mal crystal to us.$B$BGive over the two shards and I will see to it that they are combined into their final form. Then you will have access to the Arcatraz.
